p.4: Our industry-leading client is looking for a Data Scientist to turn information into insights. In this role you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and implementing fully automated production data pipelines using R and Azure stack of tools. Additionally responsible for performing database modeling and design, relational database architecture, metadata, and repository creation.

i: This is a contract to hire opportunity. Applicants must be willing and able to work on a w2 basis and convert to FTE following contract duration. For our w2 consultants, we offer a great benefits package that includes Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits, 401k with company matching, and life insurance.

li.4: Excellent communication and the ability to interact with stakeholders to gather requirements
li.5: Experience developing data visualizations for public facing Power BI dashboards
